bioSection.bioParagraph1: Lillie King has been stepping on stages since she was 10. She began writing her own music in her early teen years, and after recording her first song at a tiny studio in Morgantown, West Virginia, she became addicted to the feeling of writing and performing her own work. At 22 years old, she has taken her passion and turned it into a growing collection of music that reflects the experiences of a young woman introducing herself to the world.
bioSection.bioParagraph2: She now records in Nashville creating fun, soulful, new country sounds. Growing up in a small town in West Virginia has left an imprint that you can hear in her music, while influences in soul and country have led her to a unique sound that is sure to leave you coming back for more.

missionStatement: To create authentic country music with a soulful edge, reflecting the genuine stories and experiences of small-town life and personal growth. Lillie King is committed to producing music that resonates deeply with listeners, blending heartfelt lyrics and dynamic sounds to leave a meaningful and lasting impression..

hero.storyText: Lillie King has been stepping on stages since she was 10. She began writing her own music in her early teen years, and after recording her first song at a tiny studio in Morgantown, West Virginia, she became addicted to the feeling of writing and performing her own work.

Growing up in a small town in West Virginia has left an imprint that you can hear in her music, while influences in soul and country have led her to a unique sound that is sure to leave you coming back for more.

Lillie King is committed to producing music that resonates deeply with listeners, blending heartfelt lyrics and dynamic sounds to leave a meaningful and lasting impression.
mission.title: THE MISSION
